document.full_text: yoko kubota is a reuters correspondent based in tokyo, who covers political and general news in japan. aged 29, she grew up in japan and the united states and joined reuters in 2007.
document.title: witness: japan's tsunami recalls devastation of world war ii
lines_and_colors: yoko kubota is a reuters correspondent based in tokyo, who covers political and general news in japan. aged 29, she grew up in japan and the united states and joined reuters in 2007.
